name: NSAtomicStoreCacheNode
desc: A concrete class that you use to represent basic nodes in a Core Data atomic store.

items.name: init(objectID: NSManagedObjectID)
items.desc: Returns a cache node for the given managed object ID.

items.name: var objectID: NSManagedObjectID
items.desc: The managed object ID of the node.

items.name: var propertyCache: NSMutableDictionary?
items.desc: The property cache dictionary of the node.

items.name: func value(forKey: String) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the value for a given key.

items.name: func setValue(Any?, forKey: String)
items.desc: Sets the value for the given key.
